extension.description: AuraMod is a Heavily Modified version of Aura by jurialmunkey. Combining parts and code of Aura,AZ2,Titan bingie, and many other skins Credit to all those Devs for without them this would not be possible [COLOR cyan]Mods to Aura by skyfsza,inb4after,SerpentDrago[/COLOR]
